observation: Crypto Nest | Crypto Hardware Wallets & Seed Phrase Storage  Skip to content Previous Free next-day delivery on all UK ordersüì¶ 7% Off When you pay in Bitcoin‚ö°Code: BTC7 Next Home Shop Shop All All Products Categories Hardware Wallets Seed Phrase Storage Accessories Brands BitBox Bitkey Blockstream Coinkite Cryptosteel Cryptotag Ellipal Keystone SafePal Tangem Trezor Yubico Bundles All Bundles Backup Packs Multi Packs Learn Crypto Explained Product Guides Cryptionary About Us Contact Navigation Crypto Nest Newsletter 0 Search Login Cart Cookie policyüç™ We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyse site traffic and increase the performance of our site. You can change the cookie settings below. For more information, see our privacy policy Accept Decline SIGN UP FOR 5% OFF Get access to exclusive promotions, new product releases and sales. Your e-mail Subscribe Your cart is empty Start shopping Add order note Save It's your crypto, own it. Shop now Official partners Best sellers Sold out Coldcard MK4 5.0 rating (1 votes) (1) Sale price BitBox02 Multi Edition + Add to cart Tangem Wallet 2.0 (3 Card set) 2 colors available Quick view Ellipal Titan Mini (2) WHY CRYPTO NEST? Founded in 2021, Crypto Nest is proud to be the one-stop-shop for all things Crypto hardware in the UK, Europe and beyond. We work tirelessly to source the best Crypto hardware products from market-leading brands around the world. If you're looking to take your first step into the world of self-custody or looking to add additional hardware to your existing self-custody setup then we have the products for you. We proudly supply products to retail Crypto investors, Crypto enthusiasts and all-around security-conscious individuals around the world. Enabling individuals and businesses to maximise security and minimise threats to their digital assets and digital identity. At Crypto Nest, we offer the best selection of Cryptocurrency hardware wallets, seed phrase backups, security keys and more from brands all around the world. We also have a free education section on our site which includes detailed product setup guides, a Crypto dictionary and simple breakdowns of complex Crypto topics. So, not only do we supply the products, but we also provide the guidance and education needed to use them safely. As a company our research never stops, we are always on the lookout for the next best hardware wallet, seed phrase backup or security keys. Since the day we took our first delivery of products we have continued to expand our product range at a rapid rate.¬†All of the products we sell we test ourselves so that we can create up-to-date product guides and provide the highest level of technical support to our customers. We can also advise customers on which product would be best for them based on their specific circumstances. OUR GUARANTEE We have absolute confidence in our products, so much so that we guarantee 100% satisfaction with every order. If you don't feel as though your expectations have been met or just change your mind, we offer a full 30-day money-back guarantee. But it doesn't stop there; we also guarantee the authenticity of all our products. All items are shipped directly from the manufacturers to our secure warehouse facility here in the UK and then straight to our customers around the world. For additional peace of mind, you can always reach out to the manufacturer to confirm product authenticity. Great product, very fast delivery, recommended company Kevin M. my item was authentic and new as described, I would definitely purchase from Crypto Nest again Wayne S. My order was safe, secure and delivered in a timely Manor Darren M. Go to slide 1 The UK's leading retailer of Cryptocurrency hardware. thought: I don't see any signs of a scam on this website. The prices seem reasonable, and the company information is provided. There are no claims of unusually high returns or free money. The privacy policy and contact information seem legitimate. {

observation.reason: The website does not exhibit any of the characteristics of a scam website. The prices are not unusually low there are no claims of getting an impossible amount of money and the company information is available and legitimate.
